title: The Golden Rule
description: The Golden Rule is one of the most important rules for everyone to understand and follow because it helps our world to be a kinder place! The Golden Rule provides students with examples of how treating people the way you want to be treated can help spread kindness and help everyone make good choices. Colorful, detailed photographs complement the information provided by the text. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details as well as the proper use of capitalization and punctuation.
